title: Arco Iris
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Macrobiotic, Western, Buffet, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A simple and small restaurant; relocated here from same street #196. All but around two menu items are either vegan or vegetarian, except for two menu items.
